title: Anyone currently studying in PES , Ring Road?
content:
Hey guys,  
I need some urgent help from someone who is currently studying in PESU, ring road campus.   
I was a BTech student there, and graduated in 2021.  
I need my Transfer Certificate urgently as I need to submit the same in new university but I am trying to call PESU from last 4 days but they won't pick at all.

If anyone can please help, it will be great üôèüôè

comments.body: I was from CSE ! doesn't matter actually coz I want just someone to please go to Jawahar building only to ask about my Transfer Certificate on monday ! I don't live in Bangalore otherwise it wouldn't be an issue for me
school leaving certificate.. we need to submit that from previous university/school to next
